Header: 59 Other Ranks Pass out in Counter Insurgency and Jungle Warfare Course at Maduruoya
Content: Fifty nine Other Ranks who successfully completed the Counter Insurgency and Jungle Warfare (CIJW) Senior Non Commissioned Officers'/Non Commissioned Officers' Course No - 28 in the Army Training School at Maduruoya, passed out in a colorful ceremony on Saturday (19). The Commandant of the Army Training School Brigadier S.P.K.A Pilapitiya, graced the occasion as the Chief Guest. Award for the Best Student was received by Lance Corporal A. Waruna of 1 Commando Regiment. A parade coloured the event. Officers and Other Ranks took part in the day's arrangement.
